title: Ukraine and Russia trade blame over fire at nuclear plant
description: Both sides say there has been no detected radiation spike at the occupied Zaporizhzhia plant.

title: Pilot killed as chopper crashes into Australian hotel
description: The company which charters the helicopter told local media it had been on an "unauthorised" flight.

description: More than 600 Palestinians and at least 17 Israelis have been killed in the West Bank since October.

description: An aircraft carrier, the USS Abraham Lincoln, is also ordered to get to the region more quickly .

description: The Mission: Impossible star, known for his love of stunts, wowed the Stade de France.

title: Residents evacuated as wildfires near Athens spread
description: People in the historic town of Marathon are among those affected as the country deals with a series of blazes.

title: Venezuela opposition urges global protest over poll result
description: Both President Maduro and the opposition have claimed victory in Venezuela's presidential elections.

title: 'I don't live, I just exist': Ukrainian families torn apart by visa changes
description: The government is facing calls to reverse changes making it harder for Ukrainians to bring family to the UK.

title: Biden explains why he dropped out of White House race
description: The president says his candidacy would have been a "real distraction" for Democrats and that his highest priority was to defeat Donald Trump.
